//==========================================================================================================================================================================================================
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- GTA X-Files IV (2024) ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- By james227uk ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//==========================================================================================================================================================================================================
// Name:        Interior Agents
// Description: This script generates random agents within the Prospero H.Q. interior.
// Path:        main\externals\External-HQAgentsInterior.txt
// Trigger:     Upon entering the Prospero H.Q. interior.
//==========================================================================================================================================================================================================
{$USE CLEO}
{$USE NewOpcodes}

script_name 'HQAGTES'
var fSpawnX: array 3 of Float
var fSpawnY: array 3 of Float
var fSpawnZ: array 3 of Float

fSpawnX[0] = 0.0
fSpawnX[1] = 1.0
fSpawnX[2] = 2.0

fSpawnY[0] = 0.0
fSpawnY[1] = 1.0
fSpawnY[2] = 2.0

fSpawnZ[0] = 0.0
fSpawnZ[1] = 1.0
fSpawnZ[2] = 2.0


Int iRandomIndex = Math.RandomIntInRange(0, 2)
Debugger.LogLine({Filename:}logPath, {Timestamp:}True, {Text:}"[Main] [ERROR] Coords: %f %f %f.", fSpawnX[iRandomIndex], fSpawnY[iRandomIndex], fSpawnZ[iRandomIndex])
wait 10
iRandomIndex = Math.RandomIntInRange(0, 2)
Debugger.LogLine({Filename:}logPath, {Timestamp:}True, {Text:}"[Main] [ERROR] Coords: %f %f %f.", fSpawnX[iRandomIndex], fSpawnY[iRandomIndex], fSpawnZ[iRandomIndex])
wait 10
iRandomIndex = Math.RandomIntInRange(0, 2)
Debugger.LogLine({Filename:}logPath, {Timestamp:}True, {Text:}"[Main] [ERROR] Coords: %f %f %f.", fSpawnX[iRandomIndex], fSpawnY[iRandomIndex], fSpawnZ[iRandomIndex])
wait 10
iRandomIndex = Math.RandomIntInRange(0, 2)
Debugger.LogLine({Filename:}logPath, {Timestamp:}True, {Text:}"[Main] [ERROR] Coords: %f %f %f.", fSpawnX[iRandomIndex], fSpawnY[iRandomIndex], fSpawnZ[iRandomIndex])
wait 10
iRandomIndex = Math.RandomIntInRange(0, 2)
Debugger.LogLine({Filename:}logPath, {Timestamp:}True, {Text:}"[Main] [ERROR] Coords: %f %f %f.", fSpawnX[iRandomIndex], fSpawnY[iRandomIndex], fSpawnZ[iRandomIndex])
terminate_this_script
